actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation

official_title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to eliminate the requirement that a request for the correction of a military record be filed within 3 years after discovery of the error.

summary.text: Amends the correction of records provisions under general military law to eliminate the requirement that an application for a correction of a military record be made within three years of the discovery of the error.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to eliminate the requirement that a request for the correction of a military record be filed within 3 years after discovery of the error.
